summary: Maggie Valentine was awarded a grant to help make bitcoin wallets less complicated for non-crypto users.
title: Square Funds Designer to Make Crypto Wallets Usable by Anyone
content: Square Crypto, the cryptocurrency arm of the payments company, said in a tweet Friday it has awarded a grant to a designer who's trying to make bitcoin wallets usable by anyone, regardless of technical proficiency.
